sub_title: Deputy Finance Manager at AirBridgeCargo Airlines LLC

education.grade: Accounting, analysis and audit in commercial organizations

school.name: High school in Ulyanovsk Russia “Lyceum with advanced study of English”

profile_positions.description:
-	Checking accuracy of accounts for monthly/quarterly and annual reports 
-	Supporting and supervision of finance team in EU region 
-	VAT reporting
-	Checking, booking and reconciliation of payroll journals, checking Wage and Social taxes, solving related issues with payroll companies
-	Budget preparation and cost reporting	
-	Managing Year-End preparation and procedures
-	Preparation of reporting package and intercompany acts of reconciliations 
-	Preparation of financial statements, working closely with Tax advisors in LUX, NL, DE, IT on finalizing FS and preparation CIT returns
-	Managing internal and external audits
profile_positions.title: Deputy Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Checking accuracy of accounts for monthly/quarterly and annual reports 
-	Preparation VAT reports
-	Checking payroll journals, Wage and Social taxes, solving related issues with payroll companies
-	Assisting in budget preparation
-	Monthly Budget Cost reporting
-	Monthy/weekly Revenue reporting
-	Resolution of finance related quires
-	Managing Year-End preparation and procedures
-	Preparation of reporting package and intercompany acts of reconciliations for 6 month and year 
-	Preparation of financial statements, working closely with Tax advisors on finalizing FS and preparation CIT returns
-	Managing the audit
profile_positions.title: Finance controller

profile_positions.description:
-	preparation of VAT claim (on quarterly basis in The Netherlands, monthly - Luxembourg) 
-	training and supervision of new accountants 
-	weekly, monthly revenue actual vs budget reports 
-	monthly cost actual vs budget reports 
-	booking of fixed assets and depreciation on monthly basis 
-	monitoring the key accounts, preparation of General Ledgers and trial financial statements 
-	preparation of 6 month and year reporting packages for intercompany needs 
-	communication with tax advisers to ensure the correct booking, tax report preparation in accordance with the Luxembourg, Dutch and German law 
-	providing necessary data and preparation of financial statements and reports for annual audit 
-	intercompany transactions (communication, AP, AR, Act of reconciliations) 
-	monitoring the control accounts between HQ and branches
profile_positions.title: Finance Analyst

profile_positions.description:
-	accounts payable 
-	accounts receivable  
-	preparation of monthly/ weekly cash flow  
-	payments in HSBC on-line banking, communication with banks on different issues 
-	intercompany invoicing/recharges and act of reconciliations on quarterly, yearly basis 
-	reconciliation of revenue suspense account 
-	input payroll records in SAP 
-	checking and booking in SAP expense reports and credit card reports of employees  
-	preparation of monthly budget cost report 
-	ensure accurate and timely monthly, quarterly and year end close, assisting in preparation of 6 month and year end packet for intercompany needs 
-	providing all necessary supporting details for auditors while annual financial audit 
-	executing duties of accountant in the Frankfurt office during maternity and other leave of accountant there 
-	training new employees in Finance Amsterdam and Frankfurt 
-	ensure all financial reporting deadlines are met
profile_positions.title: Assistant Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	issuing invoices to European agents of AIrBridgeCargo LLC (CASS, non CASS) 
-	uploading of CASS invoices in IATA system 
-	checking the data (rate, weight, origin, destination, etc) per shipment is the CargoSpot system before issuing the invoices 
-	checking the sales reports from General Sales Agents 
-	preparation of revenue reports 
-	communication/correspondence with European offices of the company
profile_positions.title: Accounts Receivable Specialist

company.name: State institution - Moscow regional department of Social Insurance Fund of the Russian Federation

profile_positions.company: State institution - Moscow regional department of Social Insurance Fund of the Russian Federation
profile_positions.description:
-	checking the social tax declarations from business entitles registered in Ulyanovsk Russia 
-	monitoring the social tax payment from companies  
-	collecting payments of social tax from debtors 
-	checking the companies on correct social tax calculation as per rules of Russian Legislation
-	collecting and checking documentation for refund of social payments done by  companies to their employees
profile_positions.title: Leading specialist on governmental social insurance questions with business entities
